name: Buck's Gravity-Shifting Escape from Dood's Shapes
name_original: Buck's Gravity-Shifting Escape from Dood's Shapes
description:
Buck's Escape is a local multiplayer infinite runner where one player (on keyboard) plays as buck while the other (on controller) creates the level.

All the art was hand drawn in crayon.

Controls:
  • P1
    • Space to jump
  • P2
    • Dpad up or down to raise/lower platforms
    • ABXY to spawn different platforms
    • LT, RT, LB, RB + ABXY to change between selections (hold and press button)
